text: Excellent hotel. We stayed there for our wedding anniversary and we chose it for its position next to the Chinese park - we lived in China for six years and it brought our memories back. The hotel itself has an interesting touch of modern and traditional Chinese style. The hotel staff was friendly and they arranged a small cake for us waiting in our room. I requested a room with a view at the Chinese park and it was granted. The room was spacious, everything was clean and tidy. Breakfast had a large selection of food, including about ten Chinese dishes. Staff at the restaurant and especially at the reception was very helpful. They deserve praise. The only disadvantage of this hotel is the lack of a swimming pool and spa area as in other five-star hotels.
To far from the city centre, some of the stuff were good and some of them was not
